I have recently heard of the swordsmen Sasaki Kojiro. I have also 
heard of his technique 'Tsubame-gaeshi' which is supposed to be so 
fast that could birds from mid- flight!Is this true(or even 
possible)? I am also looking up information on his life. Any 
information will be greatly appreciated.Thank you!
